source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Skool of Creativity
items.headline: Become a more effective and innovative thinker and make a real creative change in your life and work.
objectives_summary: Understand the creative process and role of the left and right brain
Overcome rigid thinking patterns
Recognise what holds back your own creativity and generate movement to get unstuck

items.title: Super Fast Writing Hacks
items.headline: How To Open Yourself Up To A Raging River Of Content Naturally
objectives_summary: Write articles, blog posts and other web based content quickly and naturally without suffering from writer's block
Attract readers who are just like you, so you can develop a tribe of readers fans and followers
Prepare yourself before laying a single keyboard stroke so you can write with fluidity and creativity

items.title: Beginner's guide to bullet journaling: how to start a bujo
items.headline: Learn how to start your own bullet journal and organize all the unnecessary clutter in your head.
objectives_summary: What Bullet Journaling is and who created it.
How to create a Bullet Journal in detail.
Best Bullet Journaling supplies.

items.title: The Writer-in-the-Know Guide to Query Letters

visible_instructors.name: Angie
visible_instructors.job_title: Director of Literary Development at Nelson Literary Agency
visible_instructors.title: Angie Hodapp

items.headline: The Key to Writing a Four-Part Query Letter That Will Get Your Manuscript Requested
objectives_summary: How to write a query letter for a novel

items.title: How to Write a Great Script with Scrivener 3
items.headline: (You Can Write a Screenplay Easier and Faster Than You Think)
objectives_summary: Turn an idea into a story outline
Learn the basics to using Scrivener 3
Organize a story using Scrivener 3

items.title: Sunkissed Glam Masterclass

visible_instructors.display_name: The Goddess Studio Tanin and Kate
visible_instructors.name: The Goddess Studio
visible_instructors.title: The Goddess Studio Tanin and Kate

items.headline: Learn to recreate a sunkissed glam makeup look with professional makeup techniques!
objectives_summary: Apply a sunkissed glam makeup look
Apply a skincare routine that’s perfect for prepping the canvas for the ultimate glow
Properly apply foundation, under-eye colour correction, brightening concealer, and strategic powdering

items.title: Acrylic Painting for 100% Beginners: "Golden Girls" Course

visible_instructors.name: Melissa
visible_instructors.job_title: Creative Class Instructor and Bakery Business Mentor
visible_instructors.title: Melissa Fryer

items.headline: Easily craft your unique acrylic painting, in just a few hours, by watching and following uncomplicated tips and steps.
objectives_summary: Complete a DIY acrylic painting from scratch, that can be displayed or given as a gift.
Learn to construct and use a template to create an outline for a painting.
Learn how to utilize a wet-on-wet painting technique to easily create a smooth painting image.

items.title: Category Romance Outline Writing Course
items.headline: Learn the exact method a best selling romance publisher uses to outline their books
objectives_summary: How to use the tropes readers love without being formulaic and slipping into cliché
How to develop rich characters with goals, motivations, values and conflict baked in before any plot is laid down
How asking carefully crafted questions will bring out the best in your characters and story

items.title: Learn How to Write A fiction Novel in 5 Weeks!
items.headline: Part 2
objectives_summary: In this course, you will discover the power of the 27 Chapter Novel outline, which allows you to write a novel from start to end in 27 days and or 4 weeks.
You will learn how to efficiently prep and outline your novel ideas in less than a week.
You will learn the proper way of formatting a manuscript.

items.title: Video Editing in DaVinci Resolve 16/17 - Complete Course
items.headline: Video Editing from beginner to professional
objectives_summary: Learn video editing with DaVinci Resolve
Learn how to import, cut, edit and colour grade your footage.
Learn creative editing

items.title: Writing | Writing a Thriller Novel for Beginners
items.headline: Learn the Fundamentals of Thriller Writing
objectives_summary: You will learn how to plot a thriller
You will learn how to create fear in your story
You will learn how to write a twist and twist ending

items.title: Card Magic MASTERCLASS: Learn World-Class Magic Tricks Today
items.headline: The Secrets of Incredible Card Magic Tricks & Performance With an Award-Winning Magician - Start Amazing People Now!
objectives_summary: Perform Miracles in a Matter of Minutes
World-Class Magic With an Award-Winning Magician
Handle a Deck of Cards Beautifully

items.title: Create Powerful Stories in Minutes - Complete Storytelling
items.headline: Write & Tell Memorable Stories! That Engage, Influence & Makes Connection With Any Audience - Storytelling.
objectives_summary: Create memorable stories in minutes using our proven method
Tell stories that Engage, Inspire & Connect with any audience
Create your massive personal or business story bank

items.title: MindMapping: unlock the full potential of your brain!

visible_instructors.name: Rudy
visible_instructors.job_title: Training Expert in Office, Mind Mapping & SpeedReading!
visible_instructors.title: Rudy Rensink

items.headline: Mind Mapping for REMEMBERING, WORKING & LEARNING, both handdrawn and on several devices. You will learn it here!
objectives_summary: You can fully unlock the potential of your brain!
You will experience the freedom to roam the infinite expanses of your brain!
You will make Mind Maps on the most effective way!

items.headline: Write, Edit, Publish, and Market Your Novel
objectives_summary: How to deal with negative thoughts that hold back your writing
Develop a writing plan for a consistent and long term writing life
Seven step story structure for writing compelling stories in any genre

items.title: Accredited Novel Writing Course - Master Your Inner Writer!
items.headline: Turn Your Creative Writing into a Successful Novel : Co-Written by Amazon Best Selling Author
objectives_summary: Confidently understand how to create Outlines within their Novel
Understand about Genres and how to pick the right one for their book
Gain knowledge on Characterisations and developing the characters within the book
